ScreenForms

Interface InterfaceMW


  • public interface InterfaceMW
    Interface for Main Window functionality Defines methods for the main application window operations

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void exitApplication()
      Displays a confirmation dialog box for exiting the application Shows exit confirmation with image and text before closing
      void handleButtonClick(int buttonIndex)
      Handles all button clicks in the application Processes user interactions with toolbar buttons
      void show()
      Shows the main application window Makes the window visible to the user
